item.title: TypeScript Build Errors When Publishing ASP.Net Web Project
item.description: I had TypeScript files building and running perfectly when I’d debug locally, but when I changed over to publish the project, I got build errors galore: Cannot find module ___ TS6053 â€“ File ___ not found I had forgotten that I set up my TypeScript Build configuration for Debug, but I hadn’t changed anything for the Release configuration in Visual Studio. Obviously, that would produce different build results, right?
